text: ཀུན་སྤངས་ཐུགས་རྗེ་བརྩོན་འགྲུས་ཀྱི་གསུང་འབུམ། Works of Kunpang Thugje Tsondue 土杰尊珠大師全集

nodes.en: Volume 1, ༼ཀ༽
dpal dus kyi 'khor lo bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal por zab lam rdo rje'i rnal 'byor rnam par gtan la phab pa mdor bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi snying po'i rgya cher 'grel pa dri ma med pa'i 'od bzhugs so/ /
dpal dus kyi 'khor lo bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal por zab lam rdo rje'i rnal 'byor rnam par gtan la phab pa mdor bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi snying po'i dka' 'grel pad ma can bzhugs/
Volume 2, ༼ཁ༽
dkar chag
sngon 'gro dang dben gsum gyis khrid yig bzhugs so/ /
zab lam gyi thog mar dge ba'i khrid bzhugs so/ /
zab lam gyi bar du dge ba'i khrid yig bzhugs so/ /
zab lam gyi tha mar dge ba'i khrid bzhugs so/ /
dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i sgo nas sbyor ba yan lag drug gi sa lam bgrod tshul bzhugs/
sbyor drug gi ngo sprod kyi sa gcod mdo ting nge 'dzin dang bcas pa bzhugs so/ /
dpal dus kyis 'khor lo'i bsdus rgyud rtsa 'grel las phyung pa'i dbang rab 'byed rtsa 'grel gyi sa gcod/ rdo rje'i tshig 'byed gsal sgron zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i man ngag rdo rje rnal 'byor bzhi'i bsnyen bsgrub kyi bsdus don bzhugs so/ /
yu mo'i gsal sgron bzhi'i sa gcod lags so/ /
sbyor ba yan lag drug pa dpal shwa ri nas brgyud pa'i gzhung bzhugs so/ /
rnal 'byor yan lag drug pa zhes bya ba/
rnal 'byor yan lag drug pa'i 'grel pa snying po bsdus pa zhes bya ba/
shwa wa ri'i gzhung chung 'grel ba dang bcas pa bzhugs/
rnal 'byor yan lag drug gi 'grel pa snying po bsdus pa zhes bya ba/
dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i bla ma'i rnal 'byor bzhugs so/ /
dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i man ngag ye shes spyan bsgrub kyi sa gcod bzhugs so/ /
dbang mdor bstan gyi bsdus don/
lam 'bras rdo rje tshig rkang gi 'grel ba tshig don gsal byed sgron ma/
dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i thugs dkyil mngon rtogs bskyed rim gsal sgron bzhugs/
dpal ldan dus 'khor gyi mngon rtogs gsal sgron bzhugs so/ /
dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs shin tu mdor bsdus pa rin chen sgron me bzhugs so/ /
dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i rdo rje slob dpon dbang gi cho ga bzhugs so/ /
dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho'i bstod pa kun mkhyen chen pos mdzad pa bzhugs so/ /
dpal ldan bla ma dam pa chos rje thams cad mkhyen pa chos sku 'od zer gyi rnam thar yon tan rin po che gsal byed sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
